job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s in a computer-related field; graduate degree preferred

jd: From: Awkash Kumar, Largeton INC awkash@largeton.us Reply to: awkash@largeton.us JD :: Job Responsibilities:Lead the SharePoint/Intranet team as the technical authority, providing consultation and guidance.Convert business requirements into technical specifications and design recommendations.Direct SharePoint development activities, ensuring alignment with project goals and timelines.Oversee the implementation of enterprise-level website and intranet solutions.Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables.Ensure adherence to best practices in SharePoint development and configuration management.Provide leadership in Agile methodologies, with preference for candidates holding PMP and Scrum Master certifications.Education:Minimum bachelor’s degree in a computer-related field; graduate degree preferred.Experience:10 years of continuous SharePoint development experience in enterprise environments.At least 3 recent years leading an Enterprise SharePoint development team.Strong understanding of PMP principles and Agile methodologies.
